data.comment: Kevin Van Damme starts the match. Kortrijk with the kick-off in Charleroi.
Kortrijk have been given a penalty at Stade du Pays de Charleroi...
In the minute 34, Trent Sainsbury (Kortrijk) has received a first yellow card.
The first-half has come to a close in Charleroi.
The second half is underway in Charleroi - Charleroi with the kick-off.
In the minute 47, Marco Ilaimaharitra is booked for the home team.
Shamar Nicholson (Charleroi) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Karim Belhocine is making the team's first substitution at Stade du Pays de Charleroi with Saido Berahino replacing Ali Gholizadeh.
In the minute 67, Kortrijk make their first substitution with Faiz Selemani replacing Michiel Jonckheere.
At Stade du Pays de Charleroi, Ilombe Mboyo has been yellow-carded for the away team.
The away team replace Hannes Van Der Bruggen with Yevhen Makarenko.
In the minute 75, Charleroi's Steeven Willems has been booked in Charleroi.
Guillaume Gillet (Charleroi) gets a yellow card.
Yves Vanderhaeghe (Kortrijk) is making a third substitution, with Jovan Stojanovic replacing Habib Gueye.
In the minute 86, The home team have replaced Marco Ilaimaharitra with Massimo Bruno. This is the second substitution made today by Karim Belhocine.
Ken Nkuba is replacing Mamadou Fall for Charleroi at Stade du Pays de Charleroi.
It's 0-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
